Load data file

Source: R/save_load.R
load_data.Rd

If the original data are available, this function loads the original data. If only a synthetic dataset is available, this function loads the synthetic data.

load_data()

Value

A data.frame of class "worcs_data", containing the original data, if available, or a synthetic version of the data, if the original data are unavailable. The data.frame has an attribute, "type", indicating whether the data are synthetic or original.

Examples

the_test <- "loaddata"
old_wd <- getwd()
dir.create(file.path(tempdir(), the_test))
setwd(file.path(tempdir(), the_test))
open_data(iris[1:5, ], codebook = NULL)
